name: The College Brickout
summary: Get ready to experience the ultimate gaming adventure with THE COLLEGE BRICKOUT. This game features popular artist Kanye West as the protagonist, where players have to help him navigate through various challenges and obstacles to reach his ultimate goal, with it's new and sealed packaging, this game is a must-have for any video game enthusiast. The game is compatible with PlayBlocks 2 and promises hours of entertainment and fun. So, gear up and get your hands on the most exciting game of the year, THE COLLEGE BRICKOUT!
